original_title: Jethro Tull: Too Old to Rock'n'Roll, Too Young To Die! (The TV Special Edition)
overview: Too Old To Rock ‘n’ Roll, Too Young To Die! – The TV Special Edition Deluxe features a previously unreleased re-recorded version of the album for a 1976 UK TV special.  It additionally contains original LP tracks and rare associated recordings, plus 2015 5.1 and stereo mixes by Steven Wilson.
title: Jethro Tull: Too Old to Rock'n'Roll, Too Young To Die! (The TV Special Edition)
